Q_DESC:
Mr.Sathyadev is software programmer currently working in a project to collect employees name and their father's name. He wants to generate the employees name as per the following format using Character Arrays. Help him in developing the program for this.                                                               
Input: 
First Name 
Middle Name
Father Name

Output:
Name :  First Name    Middle Name   First Character of Father Name
